{"id":488698866,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1620123456,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/488698866/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"27 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkPossibility(vector<int>& nums) {\n        bool fixed = false;\n        for (int i = 1; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            if (nums[i] < nums[i - 1]) {\n                if (fixed) return false;\n                fixed = true;\n                if (i <= 1 || nums[i] >= nums[i-2]) continue;\n                else nums[i] = nums[i - 1];\n            }\n        } \n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array"}
